name: Chirag Doctor
body:
##  SUMMARY

A Web Developer with full stack skills for software creation. Has eagerness to learn about new technologies and excellent knowledge of the industry. Experience of working in global multicultural environment with passion for innovation and always going an extra mile to make a difference.
 
***

##  CORE SKILLS

### Node & Javascript 
* NodeJs, ExpressJs & Handlebars.
* Micro service architecture for less coupling and dependencies.  
* Isomorphic apps using React / Flux.
* RabbitMQ for messaging and application scalability. 
* ES6 language features and transpilation using babel.
* Grunt & Gulp for frontend builds and packages.
* Browser & smoke testing using Nightwatch. 
* Code standards using  ESLint & JSLint.
* jQuery & loDash as libraries.
* Continuous Integration and deployment using Jenkins. 

### C# & .Net
* Object-orientation & refactoring using SOLID principles.  
* Single Page Application using MVC4 and WebAPI.
* Site scraping tool for scraping resources.
* Design patterns for reusability.
* Integrating with payment gateway API’s like MPP and DataCash.
* Using Entity Framework and LINQ as ORM. 
* Improving maintainability of code.
* Async and Await for upload avatar functionality.  

### Database
* Database design.
* Operations and Aggregation queries using MongoDB.
* Performance tuning of Stored Procedures and query optimisation.
* SSIS for small migration tasks & SSRS for reports..
* Knowledge about Cassandra usage.

### Testing
* TDD / unit and integration testing using various testing frameworks like SuperTest, Sinon, Karma, Chai & Mocha for Node based applications. Karma for UI based tests. 
* TDD / BDD approach for writing test cases for .NET applications using frameworks like NUnit and Moq.

Auth
Cloud based storage provider authentication using OAuth.
SAML authentication for third party to authorise uses.

### Agile
* Good understanding of Agile-scrum & Kanban process methodologies.
* Practising pair programming, story defining and analysing.
* Some experience of story estimation.
* Understanding the need for Minimum Viable Product in software engineering. 
* Good experience on pair programming practices.  

### To Production
* Deploying and hosting .net sites on IIS servers
* Knowledge of deploying Node apps and services using dockerized containers.
* Writing build scripts for build processes and deploying docker containers to s3.
 

## PROFESSIONAL EXPOSURE (6+ Years)
***

### TES Global | London 
[www.tes.co.uk](www.tes.co.uk) | [www.tesspag.com](www.tesspag.com) | [www.tesphonics.com](www.tesphonics.com)  
### Software Engineer 							                     Jul ’12 - Aug ‘15 
 Rebuilding TES using cutting-edge tech stack like Node, React and Docker. Initial release included creating responsive pages for member and profile page.
Followed by developing a customised home page for user which will be social network for teachers and will display news feed and post for users. 
Involved in complete development life-cycle with minimum viable product approach.
Pair programming for story implementation, writing test cases and solving complex problems. 
Making use of angular to make apps using custom directives, routing, dependency injection and MVC framework. Also using protractor to do end to end testing for angular based apps. 

**Stack: Node.js, Express JS, Handlebars, React, ES6, Jenkins, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, AWS-S3, GitHub, Cassandra, TDD & BDD, Protractor, Karma**.     

### Web Developer								     

Worked on various projects like TES Pro (single page app), which included integration with payment provider and storage service and also using TPL for writing asynchronous upload and download handlers for documents and images. 
TDD and BDD approach to develop Web Api’s and Web services using WCF and MVC 4.
SAML implementation for Microsites like TES SPAG, TES PHONICS & TES Digital. 
AngularJs for internal CMS system which includes data binding, custom directives and filtering. 
Site Scraping utility for resources.
Involvement in BAU issues.  

**Stack: C# 5.0, MVC 3.0+, Web API, .NET 4.5+, LINQ, AngularJS, SQL, IIS 6+, SVN, EF 5.0+, TDD & BDD, TPL, AngularJs**

### VEXED Digital -  Domino’s Pizza 
[www.dominos.co.uk](www.dominos.co.uk) | [www.dominos.de](www.dominos.de)
### Senior Software Engineer 							        Jun ’11 - Jun ’12
Meal Deal Wizard, Group ordering and Meal deal recommendations based on orders. 
Localizing Dominos website for Germany. 
Mobile apps and website features development and maintenance.
Paring up with starter to get them up to speed for development. 
Mobile apps development using javascript and jQuery. Analytics based UI switches.

**Stack: C# 3.0+, .NET 3.5+, SQL, Agile-Scrum Process, WCF, IIS 7.5, Javascript, SVN, Google Analytics, TDD** 

### MANGAL Services - CIPLA
### Software Engineer							     	         Oct ’09 - Mar ’11
Web based Inventory Management System module and creating many SSIS packages and deploying them on SQL server. 
Performance tuning for SSRS based reports. 
Web app based on Web forms and web services. 
Deploying and versioning rollouts on production system. Good error solving capability with minimal supervision for solving issues on live system. 
Analysing complex stored procedures, user defined functions and triggers in SQL Server for bug fixing in production.

**Stack: C# 2.0, ASP .NET 3.5, Web Forms, .NET AJAX, SQL Server, SSRS, SSIS, Web Services, IIS 6.0**

### MANGAL Services - Forbes India 
[www.suvidhaa.com](www.suvidhaa.com)
High volume transaction web app with more that 80,000 retail outlets using the system. 
Publishing and enhancing web services which will be consumed by other applications for utility bill payment & management. 
Parsing various SOAP requests and responses.
Developing system based on service oriented architecture model for providing E-commerce services. 
Root cause analysis and providing solution to problems on production environment. 

**Stack: C# 2.0+, ASP .NET 3.5+, WCF, LINQ, IIS 6.0, Agile-XP Process, XML, EF 4.0, SNV**

### MANGAL Services - Dhanlakshmi Bank 
Analysing requirements and developing micro finance module for insurance policies.
Implementing form based authentication.
Module was deployed on Sharepoint server. 

**Stack: C#, ASP .NET 2.0, HTML, ASP .NET AJAX, SharePoint Server**


### VISION SYSTEM GROUP | New Jersey
### Web Developer						                            May ’08 - Mar ’09 
Developing a payroll system for employees as an internal requirement. Requirements were gathered by attending training on payroll system. 
This project was developed using Web Forms and Forms based authentication. 

**Stack: C#, ASP .NET 2.0, HTML, SQL Server 2000**


## INTERNSHIP
***

### NCR Teradata | Los Angeles
### Software Engineering Intern					             	         Jun ’07 - Aug ’07

Web based GUI for generating reports for Automation tool testing framework. 
Data Visualisation was done using different types of graphs. Graphs were implemented using ColdFusion. 


## QUALIFICATIONS
***

* Master’s in Computer Science - University of Southern California - May 2008 
* Bachelors of Computer Engineering - University of Mumbai - May 2005
			 
## FULL STACK DETAILS
*** 
* Backend stack		
 * Various .NET frameworks & Node.
* Frontend stack		
 * ReactJS, AngularJS, Knowledge of Backbone and Handlebars for templating.
* Deployments stack	
 * IIS for .NET & AWS for Node apps & services.
* Language set	 	
 * C# & Javascript.
* Database systems	
 * SQL Server, mongodb, mysql, Cassandra.	
* Frameworks and libs	
 * MVC versions, Web Forms, Express, jQuery, NUnit, Moq.
* Source control 		
 * GitHub, SVN.
* Ide’s			
 * Visual Studio, WebStorm. 
 

**References available on request**
